value: Let's dive in with a code sample

Which of the following will evaluate to true?
I. True and False
II. False or True
III. False and (True or False)

correct.value: Expression with ‘and’ operator would be True only if both the operands are True. Expressions with or operator is True only if one or both of the operands are True.

incorrect.value: Expression with ‘and’ operator would be True only if both the operands are True. Expressions with or operator is True only if one or both of the operands are True.
